member.name: IPropertyStoreCapabilities.IsPropertyWritable
member.summary: Queries whether the property handler allows a specific property to be edited in the UI by the user.
member.param: A reference to structure that represents the property being queried.

returns.para: Returns one of the following values.

listheader.description: The property can be edited and stored by the handler.

member.name: IPropertyStoreCapabilities
member.summary: Exposes a method that determines whether a property can be edited in the UI by the user.
